report.dataset: select t.transnumber, dir.groupvalue as direction, case when t.ref_transnumber is null then '' else t.ref_transnumber end as ref_transnumber, p.planumber, p.description as cdesk, p.curr, -pm.amount as amount, substr(cast(t.crdate as char(10)), 1, 10) as crdate, substr(cast(pm.paiddate as char(10)), 1, 10) as paiddate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.fnote is null then '' else t.fnote end as fnote, case when emp.empnumber is null then '' else emp.empnumber end as empnumber from trans t inner join groups dir on dir.id=t.direction inner join place p on p.id=t.place_id inner join payment pm on pm.trans_id=t.id left join employee emp on emp.id=t.employee_id where t.id= @id

select t.transnumber, dir.groupvalue as direction, case when t.ref_transnumber is null then '' else t.ref_transnumber end as ref_transnumber, p.planumber, p.description as cdesk, p.curr, -pm.amount as amount, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t.crdate, 120) as crdate, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), pm.paiddate, 120) as paiddate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.fnote is null then '' else t.fnote end as fnote, case when emp.empnumber is null then '' else emp.empnumber end as empnumber from trans t inner join groups dir on dir.id=t.direction inner join place p on p.id=t.place_id inner join payment pm on pm.trans_id=t.id left join employee emp on emp.id=t.employee_id where t.id= @id

select t.transnumber, t.curr, cast(iamount.value as REAL) as amount, lrate.value as rate, case when c.custname is null then '' else c.custname end as customer from link l left join fieldvalue lrate on lrate.fieldname='link_rate' and lrate.ref_id=l.id left join fieldvalue iamount on iamount.fieldname='link_qty' and iamount.ref_id=l.id inner join groups g1 on g1.id=l.nervatype_1 and g1.groupname='nervatype' and g1.groupvalue='payment' inner join payment pm on pm.id=l.ref_id_1 inner join groups g2 on g2.id=l.nervatype_2 and g2.groupname='nervatype' and g2.groupvalue='trans' inner join trans t on t.id=l.ref_id_2 and t.deleted=0 left join customer c on t.customer_id=c.id where pm.trans_id= @id

select t.transnumber, t.curr, cast(iamount.value as decimal) as amount, lrate.value as rate, case when c.custname is null then '' else c.custname end as customer from link l left join fieldvalue lrate on lrate.fieldname='link_rate' and lrate.ref_id=l.id left join fieldvalue iamount on iamount.fieldname='link_qty' and iamount.ref_id=l.id inner join groups g1 on g1.id=l.nervatype_1 and g1.groupname='nervatype' and g1.groupvalue='payment' inner join payment pm on pm.id=l.ref_id_1 inner join groups g2 on g2.id=l.nervatype_2 and g2.groupname='nervatype' and g2.groupvalue='trans' inner join trans t on t.id=l.ref_id_2 and t.deleted=0 left join customer c on t.customer_id=c.id where pm.trans_id= @id

select df.description as fielddef, case when fg.groupvalue in ('bool') and fv.value = 'true' then '={{lb_yes}}' when fg.groupvalue in ('bool') and fv.value = 'false' then '={{lb_no}}' when fg.groupvalue in ('customer') then rf_customer.custnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('tool') then rf_tool.serial when fg.groupvalue in ('transitem','transmovement','transpayment') then rf_trans.transnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('product') then rf_product.partnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('project') then rf_project.pronumber when fg.groupvalue in ('employee') then rf_employee.empnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('place') then rf_place.planumber else fv.value end as value, fv.notes as notes from fieldvalue fv inner join deffield df on fv.fieldname = df.fieldname and df.nervatype = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='trans') inner join groups fg on df.fieldtype = fg.id left join customer rf_customer on fv.value = cast(rf_customer.id as char(150)) left join tool rf_tool on fv.value = cast(rf_tool.id as char(150)) left join trans rf_trans on fv.value = cast(rf_trans.id as char(150)) left join product rf_product on fv.value = cast(rf_product.id as char(150)) left join project rf_project on fv.value = cast(rf_project.id as char(150)) left join employee rf_employee on fv.value = cast(rf_employee.id as char(150)) left join place rf_place on fv.value = cast(rf_place.id as char(150)) where fv.deleted = 0 and df.visible=1 and fv.ref_id = @id
